sources.title: Hell Harbor (1930) LUPE VELEZ
sources.description:
tars: Lupe Velez, Jean Hersholt, John Holland 
Director: Henry King

The granddaughter of Pirate Henry Morgan plots to escape the lawless island she lives on and sail to Havana. But when her abusive father promises her to the greasy local merchant, she does everything in her power to make her dream a reality!

metadata.Plot: Anita Morgan, a descendant of the famous pirate Henry Morgan, is living a carefree and careless life on an island in the Carribean, but had much rather be living the same life In Havana. When she learns that her father, in exchange for money, has promised her hand in marriage to one of his swarthy friends, she is more convinced that Havana is the place to be. When an American comes to the island to buy some pearls, she falls in love with him. and when she discovers he is to be tricked out of his money and killed, she makes plans to save him...and go to Havana with him.
metadata.Writer: Frédérique De Grésac, Rida Johnson Young, Clarke Silvernail
metadata.Actors: Lupe Velez, Jean Hersholt, John Holland
